spec_data.Name: perl-Test-Exception
spec_data.Description:
This module provides a few convenience methods for testing exception
based code. It is built with Test::Builder and plays happily with
Test::More and friends.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 04:45:01 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Library of test functions for exception based Perl code
